fallback.question: How does your service work?
fallback.answer: Our service is designed to be simple and straightforward. After signing up, you'll get immediate access to all features.

fallback.question: What is your pricing model?
fallback.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans to suit businesses of all sizes. Check our pricing page for detailed information.

fallback.question: Can I cancel anytime?
fallback.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties or hidden fees.

fallback.question: Do you offer customer support?
fallback.answer: We provide 24/7 customer support via email, chat, and phone to all our customers.
